nodes.bodyText: Instead of adding another option here, I'd advise going the route of multiple toggles, similar to the approach used in the NPC Indicators Plugin so users can optionally enable outline, underline, and/or fill. (Maintaining the opacity option for the fill color is a good idea)
I removed the DisplayMode enums and followed the approach shown in the NPC indicators for multiple toggles. I also lowered the default opacity to 50 because 100 felt a little too opaque. Thanks.
I suppose these can be replaced with ColorUtil.(MIN|MAX)_RGB_VALUE given opacity is also represented by the same range

This should more closely match the existing display style config.
